product_name: Salomon Siam Cross-Country Touring Ski Poles - Women's
long_description: The Salomon Siam cross-country touring ski poles are made from a lightweight fiberglass composite and feature comfortable EVA performance grips and soft, faux-fur lined wrist straps. Mid-size lightweight touring baskets are suitable for in-track skiing and light out-of-track excursions.
short_description: The Salomon Siam cross-country touring ski poles are made from a lightweight fiberglass composite and feature comfortable EVA performance grips and soft, faux-fur lined wrist straps.
